```{r}
library(nflverse)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggimage)
```

```{r}
data <- load_pbp(2023)
```

```{r}
data <- data %>%
  filter(penalty == 0) %>%
  filter(season_type == "REG") %>%
  filter(two_point_attempt == 0)
```

```{r}
data2 <- data %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(receiver, rusher),
    names_to = "player"
)
```

```{r}
data3 <- data2 %>%
  group_by(value, posteam) %>%
  summarise(
    TDs = sum(touchdown),
    YDS = sum(yards_gained)
  )
```

```{r}
players <- load_players()
```

```{r}
players <- players %>%
  filter(status == "ACT") %>%
  filter(position == "WR" | position == "TE" | position == "RB" | position == "FB")
```

```{r}
#players$short_name[17] <- "Ju.Watson
```

```{r}
data4 <- data3 %>%
  rename(short_name = value,
         team_abbr = posteam) %>%
  inner_join(players, join_by(short_name, team_abbr))
```

```{r}
data4 <- data4 %>%
  filter(YDS < 3000) %>%
  filter(YDS > 1000)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = data4, mapping = aes(x = YDS, y = TDs)) +
  geom_image(mapping = aes(x = YDS, y = TDs, image = headshot), size = 0.15) +
  
  
theme_bw() +

  labs(
    x = "Scrimmage Yards",
    y = "Touchdowns",
    title = "The Important Super Bowl LVIII Players",
    subtitle = "2023 Regular Season (Players with > 1000 yards)",
    caption = "Data from nflverse | Graphic by Alex McKeever"
 ) +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
